# About Reddy Anna Live
Reddy Anna Live is India's premier online sports betting and casino platform established in 2010. We provide a comprehensive betting experience with live cricket betting, football, tennis, casino games, teen patti, and more.

# Services
- Live Sports Betting (Cricket, Football, Tennis, Kabaddi)
- Live Casino Games (Teen Patti, Andar Bahar, Roulette, Poker)
- Fantasy Sports
- Horse Racing & Greyhound Racing
- Binary Options
- Slots Games

# Key Features
- 10+ Lakh satisfied customers
- 200+ branches across India
- 24/7 customer support
- Fast deposits and instant withdrawals
- Secure and trusted platform
- No KYC required for basic accounts
